Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Has the Purifying Force found an antibody yet?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You're reading too much into it. I know less than you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Did they get out safely?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They're safe.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've kept my end of the bargain. I'll be leading my men away from this hellhole now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't want anything to do with this place anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This is more complicated than you think. I strongly advise you to stay out of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '"(Turn to leave) Stick to your own business, Forsaken."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Forsakens! Retreat.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '"That\'s unexpected... They haven\'t found the Commandant, but they got samples."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "The retriever is still analyzing the antigen from their tissues. I'm sure it won't be long before I find out its detailed composition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '"If I go further inside, I\'ll run into the Queen\'s royal guards sooner or later..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And the antigen might get destroyed in the fight...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Time's running out. We can't think about this now.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '"(Turns on comms) Gray Raven, I don\'t know if you\'ll hear this..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '"I just want to say that... this is Bianca. I\'m here. I\'ll save you, Commandant."', 4: '1'}
